name: Boing Boing
description:
"almost the end" prototype of LOWREZJAM 2017

--
dribble to the end

--

don't let the other players' hand grab your ball

don't let taller players grab your ball

score more points by touching those green cubes with your ball

--

Control your hand with your mouse

Press RETURN to restart the game if you get stuck at the "YOU LOSE" screen

(this bug happens way too often when you lose)

--

<3

edit : added a WebGL build, it may be a bit glitchy, if there's any problem, poke me on twitter @TahitiP4ncake
